template.name: RainbowCake Screen
template.description: Creates the required classes for a new screen - Fragment, ViewModel, ViewState and Presenter

parameter.name: Screen name
parameter.help: The name of the screen to create, without any suffixes. For example: Home, User, or Settings.

parameter.name: ViewState type
parameter.help: The ViewState type to use for the screen.

parameter.name: Include argument
parameter.help: Adds a dummy argument and a newInstance factory method for your Fragment.

parameter.name: Use AndroidX
parameter.help: Use AndroidX imports instead of the support library imports.

parameter.name: Dependency injection method solution
parameter.help: The dependency injection solution being used in the project.
